name: vk-pattern-directory-creator
description: Support Filtering Search of keyword, post-type and taxonomy.

scripts.start:first: npm install && composer install && wp-env start
scripts.update: npx ncu -u -x '@wordpress/env' && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.phpunit: composer install && bash bin/install-theme.sh && npx wp-env run phpunit "phpunit -c /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/vk-pattern-directory-creator/.phpunit.xml --testsuite default --verbose"

author: Vektor, Inc.
